ingredients.item: 400g can essential Waitrose Flageolet Beans, drained and rinsed
250g pack Waitrose Quinoa, Chickpeas, Bulgar Wheat & Rice

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onion, carrot and celery  for 5 minutes. Add the stock and beans, cover and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in the cabbage and quinoa mix and cook for 2–3 minutes. Mix in the chives and season.
